blogs.title: Make good content
blogs.body: It's important to create good content so you don't spread bad habits. You never know who is listening or watching!
blogs.author: yoshi

blogs.title: Be a good person
blogs.body: People take on each other's characteristics. Be a good person.
blogs.author: mario

blogs.title: Be happy
blogs.body: It's simple but not easy to keep this in mind. It's a daily practice!
blogs.author: mario
